body:
Detaching the base does not detach views.  Any variable with a non-null `grad_fn` also has `var.requires_grad() = true`:

https://github.com/colesbury/pytorch/blob/d5fa2c1e8af3471fbcd9ccb8d4a125036cd31707/torch/csrc/autograd/variable.h#L260-L262
